transcript_chunks.text: Phil Spencer really wants to buy Nintendo this is Jay Peters at The Verge and an August 2020 email to two top Microsoft Marketing Executives Spencer wrote that quote Nintendo is the prime asset for us in gaming getting Nintendo would be a career moment and I honestly believe it would be a good move for both companies I don't think a hostile action would be a good move so we are playing the long game it just seems like that would not be a good move for Nintendo Nintendo of course is on your list of the LeBron James of the video game industry but they are hot right now and they're not going down and being dethroned anytime soon if Nintendo is to slip up 15 years from now and is not the same Nintendo then sure but right now of course not they're not going to get their hands on
